description: A Grafana dashboard built to monitor pfSense that relies on influx and Telegraf.  All artifacts and instructions are maintained in github at https://github.com/VictorRobellini/pfSense-Dashboard

targets.query: SELECT "n_users" FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "used_percent" FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND "path" = '/var/run' AND "device" =~ /^$Disk$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "measurement" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT "value" FROM "autogen"."firewall.destination_total" WHERE ("direction" = 'in' AND "action" = 'pass') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "protocol"
SELECT "value" FROM "autogen"."firewall.destination_total" WHERE ("direction" = 'in' AND "action" = 'block') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "protocol"
SELECT "value" FROM "autogen"."firewall.source_total" WHERE ("direction" = 'in' AND "action" = 'block') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "longitude", "latitude", "city"
SELECT "value" FROM "autogen"."firewall.source_total" WHERE ("direction" = 'in' AND "action" = 'pass') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "longitude", "latitude", "city"
SELECT derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 1s)  *-1 FROM "autogen"."net" WHERE ("host" = 'pfSense-home-master.home' AND "interface" = 'vtnet0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$WAN$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("drop_in") FROM "net" WHERE ("interface" =~ /^$Interface$/ AND "host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("drop_out") FROM "net" WHERE ("interface" =~ /^$Interface$/ AND "host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("err_in") FROM "net" WHERE ("interface" =~ /^$Interface$/ AND "host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("err_out") FROM "net" WHERE ("interface" =~ /^$Interface$/ AND "host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("packets_recv") FROM "net" WHERE ("interface" =~ /^$Interface$/ AND "host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("packets_sent") FROM "net" WHERE ("interface" =~ /^$Interface$/ AND "host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "pf" WITH KEY = "host"
list.label: pfSense
list.name: Host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "pf" WITH KEY = "host"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "diskio" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/
list.name: Disk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "diskio" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "gateways" WITH KEY = "gateway_name" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/
list.name: Gateway
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "gateways" WITH KEY = "gateway_name" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/
list.name: LAN_Interfaces
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/ and cpu !~ /cpu-total/
list.name: CPU
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/ and cpu !~ /cpu-total/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "interface" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/
list.name: Interfaces
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "interface" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "temperature" WITH KEY = "sensor" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/
list.name: Sensor
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "temperature" WITH KEY = "sensor" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/

title: Firewall
